original_text: And he was teaching them many things in parables, and in his teaching he said to them:
korean_text: 이에 예수께서 여러 가지를 비유로 가르치시니 그 가르치시는 중에 그들에게 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And he was teaching them many things in parables
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 비유로 그들에게 많은 것을 가르치고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and in his teaching he said to them:
